name: Enigma I - Army Standard
description: First military version (Army), with plugboard. The only Enigma with numeric rotor labels.
PLUG: AV BS CG DL FU HZ IN KM

name: Enigma M3 - Navy Standard
description: Navy Enigma, 3 rotors, plugboard.

name: Enigma M4 - Submarine
description: Navy (submarine) Enigma, 4 rotors, plugboard.

name: Enigma D - Early Variant
description: Early variant, stepping notches on the rotors, not on the rings.

name: Enigma K - Commercial
description: Commercial version, 3 rotors, reflector settable but not stepping, no plugboard.

name: Enigma KD - Intelligence Service
description: Model K with rewirable reflector, used by Mil Amt intelligence service.

name: Enigma G - Counter Machine
description: Cogwheel mechanism instead of levers to step rotors and reflector. Frequent turnovers, manual back/forth via crank.

name: Enigma T - Tirpitz
description: Model K variant for Japanese forces. Choice of 8 rotors, 5 turnover positions each.

name: Enigma N - Norway
description: Model I with modified rotor wiring, captured machines used by Norwegian Security Police after 1945.

name: Enigma M3 - Alternative Configuration
description: Alternative Navy Enigma configuration with different rotor arrangement.

name: Enigma I - Rotor Set II V III
description: Enigma I with rotors II, V, III and reflector B.

name: Enigma I - Rotor Set IV V I
description: Enigma I with rotors IV, V, I and reflector C.

name: Enigma I - Rotor Set V IV II
description: Enigma I with rotors V, IV, II and reflector B.

name: Enigma I - Rotor Set III V IV
description: Enigma I with rotors III, V, IV and reflector A.

name: Enigma I - Rotor Set IV I V
description: Enigma I with rotors IV, I, V and reflector B.

name: Enigma M3 - Rotor Set III V VI
description: Enigma M3 with rotors III, V, VI and reflector B.

name: Enigma M3 - Rotor Set II VI VIII
description: Enigma M3 with rotors II, VI, VIII and reflector C.

name: Enigma M3 - Rotor Set IV I III
description: Enigma M3 with rotors IV, I, III and reflector B.

name: Enigma M3 - Rotor Set V II IV
description: Enigma M3 with rotors V, II, IV and reflector B.

name: Enigma M3 - Rotor Set VII III I
description: Enigma M3 with rotors VII, III, I and reflector C.
